CHAT.comment: Transcriber 1: Terri Schilthorn 19-JUN-89 Transcriber 2: Pam Cloninger 31-MAR-90

u.a: C takes cracker from cookie jar
M takes cracker package from C and opens it
C wants to be moved up to table
M moves chair up for C to sit in
M tries to open juice container; fails; then tries again
M puts juice away and C drinks juice
C is drinking juice and cannot speak clearly
C makes slurping sound while drinking
M pours more juice; C watches; M and C drink
long pause while C drinks and M watches her
C gets out of the chair; opens cookie jar; looks into it
M and C are inspecting cookie jar contents
C wants to put lid on jar
M pauses to drink and wipe off table; child reaches for cup; plays with it; imitates M wiping table
C hands cracker wrapper to M
C has foot in chair; almosts tips it over
M pours juice into C cup from her own
